items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect dress for a formal event!
items.body: I got this dress last minute it was delivered on time. The fit and the look are absolutely stunning . I got a lot of compliments the whole night. It fit comfortably and I since Iâ€™m 5 ft I got it hemmed. Read more
items.author: Patricia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous but runs small
items.body: Quality and dress is beautiful! Runs a bit small! Iâ€™m a size 8 and it fits more like a 4/6. Definitely size up! Read more
items.author: Steven Motsinger

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress suggest custom order size
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! I ordered the brown and it has rose gold like sequins in it that make it look a pretty bronze or copper color. It is lined and ruched in back just the right thickness to hide my bulges. Be careful of the sizing as they mentioned if you have a larger upper body because it is very small on top. I ordered a size that fits my hips and waist but wonâ€™t close by about 4-5 inches. I will be returning it and reordering it in a custom measurement sizing that they offer. I have been looking at expensive MOB designer dresses up in the $800-$1000 range and I actually like this one better because it will be less hot in a spring outdoor mountain wedding. Read more
items.author: Megan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the color I expected.
items.body: The peacock color was more green than teal but still a great dress. Good stretch and length. Iâ€™m 5â€™7â€ for reference in heels. Accurate sizing. I did expect more all over sequins, but I was in a pinch and received all high scores and good comments on the dress itself. Read more
items.author: Caitlin Bloomer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!!!
items.body: This dress is beautiful and heavy feeling. The sequins have not been catching. I used it for a Cinderella dress! Read more
items.author: Shannon Demont

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Glitter Sequence Prom Dress
items.body: It is tight in the bust and rides higher on the chest than I expected. I expected a lower neckline. It is super long too. Read more
items.author: Dezhi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cinderella blue perfection

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Evening V Neck Ruched Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Evening V Neck Ruched Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gold, Burgundy, Rose Gold, Hot Pink, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Dusty Rose, Light Blue, Mint Green, Red, Peacock. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
